definition[0]: to become more cheerful, active, and interested in what is happening around you, or to make someone feel this way
example[0]: She seemed kind of tired, but she perked up when Helen came over.
example[1]: There’s no doubt coffee perks you up.
definition[1]: to become more active, more interesting, more attractive etc, or to make something do this
example[2]: A little chili will perk up the sauce.
